"Been enjoying Gathering?": "Outside the City, there's a wealth of vegetables, fruits, Ores and Tames meat to be harvested."
"Those fresh ingredients and strong materials are sure to benefit you in your battles to come."
"Now that you've been getting some new weapons and upgrading them a bit, you might notice they'll require some new types of Ore."
"You want to learn more about those Ores?"
"Dualomite is a purple Ore with a jagged formation. It's an Ore similar in color to Photon Chunks, but with different properties."
"They're both gorgeous gems, but they can also be used at the Item Lab as catalysts for strengthening your equipment."
"Many can be found dotting the walls of the Southern Aerio caverns. It'd do you good to go and try finding some."
"Well, whenever you'd like to learn about Ores, just let me know."
